Aftercare.title: Aftercare
Aftercare.li1: Be sure your artist covers your new tattoo in a bandage.
Aftercare.li2: Remove the bandage after 24 hours (or sooner, if your tattoo artist recommends it). Wash your hands before taking off the bandage.
Aftercare.li3: Gently wash the tattoo with soap (antibacterial if available) and water, and pat dry with a clean paper towel.
Aftercare.li4: Apply a layer of moisturizing antibiotic ointment, but don’t put on another bandage.
Aftercare.li5: Carefully wash your tattoo area three times a day with soap and water , and gently pat it dry.
Aftercare.li6: Keep applying a moisturizer or ointment after you clean your tattoo to keep it moist. After 5 days, you can switch from an antibiotic ointment to a gentle fragrance-free body lotion. You should repeat this process for 2-4 weeks.
Aftercare.li7: If your tattoo scabs a bit or develops hard layers, don’t worry, it’s normal. But never pick, scratch, or peel your tattoo. You could get an infection or remove the color. If you think your tattoo is infected or isn’t healing properly, see your doctor.
Aftercare.li8: Avoid swimming and the sun for about 2 weeks. You want to keep your tattoo dry and out of direct sun to give it the best chance to heal properly.
Aftercare.li9: Avoid wearing tight clothing. Clothes that stick to your tattoo can be uncomfortable and delay the healing process.
Aftercare.li10: Take cool showers. Scalding hot water will not only hurt, but it can also fade the ink.
Aftercare.li11: Use sunscreen and moisturizer often. When you leave the tattoo shop, your ink will be bright and shiny. But remember, all tattoos fade over time. Always apply sunscreen on your tattoo, especially in the summer, to keep the colors bright. Choose a sunscreen with SPF 30 or higher for best protection. Moisturize your tattoo daily, especially if it’s on an area of your body, such as your hands, where it can fade quickly.

Book.p1: After selecting an available day on the calendar based on your availability, your approximate duration of appointment will be calculated based on your tattoo size.
Book.p2: For learning the exact price table, please contact us through +90 000000 0000

sizelist.XSmall: 1x1 Maximum the size of a postage stamp or smaller (1 hour appointment)
sizelist.Small: 2x2 Maximum about the size of a business card (2 hours appointment)
sizelist.Medium: 4x4 Maximum about the size of your palm (4 hours appointment)
sizelist.Large: 6x6 Maximum about the size of both hands placed together (6 hours appointment)
sizelist.XLarge: 8x8+ Half sleeves and larger (8+ hours appointment)

modal.ModalBody: For creating an appointment, please login with google

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.p: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information from and about you when you use our website.
PrivacyPolicy.p1: When you use our website, we may collect and store certain information from you. This information includes:
PrivacyPolicy.p2: When you use Google Authentication to log in, we collect basic information such as your name and email address from your Google account.
PrivacyPolicy.p3: We use Google Calendar to create and manage appointments and reminders. We may access and store data, such as event details, on your Google Calendar for the purpose of sending appointment reminders.
PrivacyPolicy.p4: We use the information collected for the following purposes:
PrivacyPolicy.p5: We use your Google account information to verify your identity and provide you with access to our website.
PrivacyPolicy.p6: We use your Google Calendar to send appointment reminders. This may include creating events and sending notifications to your Google Calendar.
PrivacyPolicy.p7: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your personally identifiable information. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website or conducting our business, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.
PrivacyPolicy.p8: You may have control over your data on our website. You can disconnect your Google account at any time, which will stop our access to your Google Calendar data.
PrivacyPolicy.p9: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. Please be aware that we are not responsible for the privacy practices of such other websites. We encourage our users to be aware when they leave our site and to read the privacy statements of each and every website that collects personally identifiable information.
PrivacyPolicy.p10: Our use of Google services, such as Google Authentication and Google Calendar, is subject to Google's Privacy Policy. You can review Google's Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.p11: We reserve the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy. The updated policy will be posted on this page with a revised `last updated` date.

ToS.title: Terms of Service
ToS.p: By using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use. If you disagree with any part of these terms, please do not use our website.
ToS.UserConduct1: You are solely responsible for your behavior and conduct on our website.
ToS.UserConduct2: You must not use our website for any unlawful purposes.
ToS.UserConduct3: Abusive, offensive, or harmful behavior towards other users is strictly prohibited.
ToS.AccountCreation1: You must provide accurate information when creating your account.
ToS.AccountCreation2: Keep your login credentials secure, and do not share your account details with others.
ToS.ContentOwnership1: You retain ownership of the content you create and share on our website.
ToS.ContentOwnership2: By sharing content on our website, you grant us a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to use, display, and distribute that content.
ToS.PrivacyDataCollection1: Our use of your information is governed by our Privacy Policy.
ToS.PrivacyDataCollection2: We collect and store data about your activity on our website to improve our services.
ToS.DisputeResolution1: If you have any concerns or disputes regarding your use of our website, please feel free to get in touch with us. We encourage you to contact us first, as we are committed to resolving issues in a fair and efficient manner.
ToS.DisputeResolution2: We will do our best to address your concerns and find a solution that satisfies all parties involved. You can reach us via our
ToS.DisputeResolution3: If for any reason we are unable to resolve a dispute through direct communication, you agree that any legal action or proceeding will be resolved in accordance with the laws and courts of Turkish Jurisdiction, without regard to its conflict of law principles.
ToS.Termination1: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account if you violate our Terms of Service.
ToS.Termination2: You may also choose to deactivate your account at any time.
